urls.title: Home ‚Äì Subjectio - Subjectio - An online storytelling project about the influence of Russian and Western powers on the perception of reality.
urls.description: Subjectio is a digital project exploring the mechanisms utilised by superpowers, the West and Russia, to manipulate the public perspective, to strengthen and execute a political agenda. By mimicking their way of contextualising photography, video and analysis, Subjectio aims to expose techniques to steer online discussions. Through an innovative online storytelling format, Subjectio materializes within existing online conversations on various social media platforms.
